# title

**Instance Property**

The string that appears in the receiver’s title bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var title: String { get set }
```

## Setting properties

- **delegate**: The receiver’s delegate or `nil` if it doesn’t have a delegate.
- **alertViewStyle**: The kind of alert displayed to the user.
- **message**: Descriptive text that provides more details than the title.
- **isVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver is displayed.
